MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:02am. Our engineers are on their way to Ferry Road substation to investigate a possible blown fuse and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:50am on Wednesday, 04 November 2020
